inn1.comm: good length outside the off stump, there is inswing after the batsman lets it go
short of a length with width outside off Sibanda was looking to cut that through point but the ball hit the bottom of the bat and went along the ground to third man
good length with some seam movement away from Masakadza after pitching outside off, he lets it go
short of a length outside off, the ball seams away from the right-hander, Masakadza moves back and across to cover off stump before shouldering arms
pitches outside off and instead of seaming away like the previous two balls did, this one nips in. Masakadza let it go and that was quite close to off stump
short of a length around off, Masakadza stays in his crease and punches on the off side
poor start from the bowler, a half-volley outside off, angling across the right-hander. Sibanda gets on to the front foot and drives fluently through cover

Sibanda gets on to the front foot, expecting the ball to seam across him from over the wicket, but this one pitches on a good length and nips back into the right-hander, smacking him in the stomach as he shoulders arms
left alone outside off stump
good length pitching outside off and going away, Sibanda lets it go again
a full ball on middle and off, played off the front foot with a closed face towards midwicket
a full delivery that seams far away from the right-hander, he lets it go again
short of a length outside off, plenty of room for the batsman, punched off the back foot through cover
a fuller and straighter ball, on off stump, played back to the bowler
a full ball just outside off, Masakadza moves forward an drives through the line, placing it past mid-off
good length outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of a length outside off stump, Masakadza gets on top of the bounce and takes one hand off the bat as he defends to point
a terrific ball, pitching on a good length around off and seaming in a touch, Masakadza defends on the front foot but is beaten on the inside edge
good length on a wicket to wicket line, defended on the leg side
good length angling across the right-hander, left alone by Sibanda
good length on middle and off, defended on he front foot
pitches on a good length outside off and slants away from Sibanda, who lets it go
he tries to go back and pull through midwicket but is cramped for room by the short of a length ball that seams back into him, he ends up jabbing it on the off side
caught behind! Sibanda tried to cut off the back foot, but the ball bounced a touch extra and cramped him for room too as it slanted across him, he got a thin top edge through to Karthik
short of a length but the line is down leg side
good length around off, defended on the front foot towards cover
tried to drive that down the ground but got an inside edge on the leg side
a length ball outside off, square driven off the back foot but it does not beat the fielder at cover point
defended on the front foot towards mid-on
short with width outside off, Masakadza waits on the back foot and cuts behind backward point
driven in the air but wide of the fielder at mid-off, Masakadza drove that on the up and did not time it, Dhawan gives chase and gets to the ball on the edge of the boundary
played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
in the blockhole, angling across the right-hander and straightening into him, Taylor defends from his crease
defended on the back foot close on the leg side
good length outside off, Taylor shoulders arms
Taylor gets on to the front foot and defends on the leg side
pitches on a good length around middle and off and angles across Taylor, squaring the right-hander up and beating the bat
defended from the crease on the leg side
a length ball outside off, there's width to play a forceful shot and Masakadza punches firmly off the back foot, he does not fin the gap at cover though
driven uppishly and not timed well into the gap at extra cover, the fielder at mid off runs to his left and cuts it off
good length outside off, left alone by the batsman
a full ball on off, Taylor tries to flick but mistimes it towards square leg, where the fielder moves to his left and tumbles as he fields
good length and straight, Taylor gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat

a huge appeal for lbw! Unadkat was dead sure but bowlers always are! Did that pitch outside leg? Most of the ball looked like it pitched in line on a good length and cut back into the right-hander, smacking him high on the back pad before he could bring his bat down. A 50-50 call on height.
left alone outside off stump
defended on the front foot

another massive appeal, this time for a caught behind! The Indians cannot believe this has not been given! There was a considerable sound as the ball passed the bat. That sounded like an edge for sure. Masakadza did not move his feet as he reached for a short of a length ball that seamed across him and tried to cut
defended from the crease to point
cut off the back foot down to third man
a length ball around off, driven on the up to the fielder at mid-off
short ball, Masakadza pulls crisply and it reaches the fielder at deep square leg on the first bounce
good length outside off, cuts back into Taylor and hits the pad off the inside edge
good length around off, Taylor plays the ball to point and wants a single, they decide against it in the end. He's still not off the mark

he's gone for a duck! After being tied down for so long, Taylor drives on the up against a good length ball that pitches around middle and off. He went hard at the ball and he thick edge flies quickly to Raina, who takes a sharp catch at second slip
good length around off stump, defended towards point
good length angling across the right-hander, left alone by the batsman
tries to drive on the off side but gets an inside edge on to the front pad because the ball straightened on the right-hander instead of angling across him
he wanted to drive that one on the up through cover point but got a thick outside edge to third man
good length outside off, the batsman lets it go
a full delivery outside off, Maruma lets it go
good length, pitching around off and slanting across, left alone once again on the front foot
the slower ball bowled full outside of, driven on the front foot to mid-off
short ball, way too short, and Masakadza hammers it off the front foot, pulling to the midwicket boundary
dabbed off the back foot towards backward point for a single
good length outside off, the batsman lets it go
a full ball in the slot outside off, driven on the front foot through cover
defended on the front foot firmly into the covers
bowled slowly on off stump, defended on the front foot
steps out of his crease and defends to the bowler, Jadeja flings the ball back at the keeper
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Marume steps out of his crease to get to the pitch of the ball an drives through extra cover
swept into the gap on the deep square leg boundary and the call is initially for two, they hurry back for three
defended on the front foot
strays down leg side, Masakadza misses the glance and the ball goes off his pad towards square leg, the wicketkeeper Karthik does the fielding

caught behind! That's a fine take from Karthik but Maruma is disappointed with the decision. He steps out of his crease and slogs across the line. There was a sound as the ball passed between the bat and the body, but replays show it beat the inside edge and brushed the thigh and nearly clipped leg stump. Karthik moved to his left and took it. Maruma's unlucky to be given out.
short of a length outside off, Williams lets it go
played off the back foot towards point
a fuller ball wide outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
short ball outside off, Masakadza goes back and cuts the ball hard, beating the fielder at backward point, where Mohit Sharma's effort to stop the ball was a poor one
played off the back foot towards point
defended on the front foot on the off side
Masakadza steps out to attack but ends up having to defend because he is not to the pitch off the ball
steered past point off the back foot
defended on the leg side
moves across his stumps to flick but misses and is hit on the pad for leg byes towards square leg
good length and straight, defended on the back foot
a fuller ball outside off stump, slanting across the left-hander from over the wicket, Williams reaches for it and is beaten, the ball bounces a second time before reaching the keeper
he tried to punch straight but got a thick outside edge through backward point. Shami went round the wicket for that one
left alone outside off stump, a short ball that was and Masakadza bent his knees to let it pass
a full ball on the pads, Masakadza flicks from his crease towards deep midwicket

bowled him! Jadeja bowled the one that went on with the arm from round the wicket. Masakadza tried to cut off the back foot but had no room because the ball was on middle and off. He got a bottom edge on to his stumps
pushed tentatively on the front foot towards point, Waller gets going immediately
pitches around off and spins sharply into the left-hander from over the wicket, defended awkwardly on the leg side
he tries to work the ball behind square but misses and is hit on the thigh
defended on the off side off the back foot
goes back and punches the ball towards midwicket
good length around off stump, played off the back foot to point
defended with a straight bat on the off side
he tries to drive through cover point, but gets a thick edge to third man
good length and straight, Williams gets behind the line and blocks
too straight that time from Shami, Williams stays in his crease and glances off his pads behind square leg
short of a length outside off, Williams lets it go
goes back to pull and gets hit plumb in front on the pads, but I think that hit the inside edge
played off the back foot on the leg side
gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg
bowled flat and slightly short, spinning into the left-hander from over the wicket, pulled off the back foot through midwicket
a confident appeal for lbw after Williams came forward to defend and was hit on the pad, but that was missing leg
played back to the bowler
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
punched from the crease towards long off
tossed up from over the wicket to the right-hander, Waller comes forward to defend but gets an inside edge towards square leg
defended on the off side
gets down on one knee and drags the ball from outside off with a well-timed slog sweep, finding the deep square leg boundary
pitched short and williams goes back and pulls through square leg again
played off the back foot through square leg
Waller goes back to cut but gets a bottom edge into the ground
bowled on a good length and straight, Waller defends on the front foot with a straight bat
he pushes forward again to defend but gets an inside edge behind square
driven on the front foot, but not timed well, through mid-on
angling in, pitches on middle, and spins across the right-hander, beating the outside edge of his back foot prod
he begins with a short ball that Williams hammers to the midwicket boundary with a powerful pull
short of a length outside off, this time he lets it go
defended from the crease towards the bowler
good length outside off, left alone by Williams
good length on off stump, Williams gets behind the line and blocks
a fuller length around off, Williams moves forward and drives to long off
pushed off the front foot through point and that's been timed so well that it requires hot pursuit from the infield
pitches on off and spins big away from Waller to beat the outside edge of his defensive push
this is the straighter one and Waller defends on the off side
played to mid-off where Pujara fumbles as they run a quick single
played off the back foot towards midwicket
punched off the back foot towards cover

a rubbish ball, a poor shot and a simple catch at mid-on. Mishra bowled a rank long hop and Waller went back to try and smash it for a six over midwicket. He mis-timed it though and made contact with the bottom of his bat and lobbed the ball tamely to Mohit
another long hop, and this time it is not mis-hit, Williams smashes it past mid off for a boundary
another short ball, maybe this is Mishra's new delivery, Williams goes back and pulls through square leg
defended on the front foot towards point
driven to mid-off on the front foot
driven on the back foot to cover
a length ball angling into the left-hander, played from the crease through midwicket
length delivery outside off from round the wicket, driven on the front foot to point
driven crisply on the up towards wide mid-off
goes back to work the ball towards square leg but misses and is hit on the thigh
played from the crease on the off side
pitches on a good length around off and slants across the right-hander, Chigumbura tries to run it to third man but is beaten
turned off the pads through square leg
played off the back foot for a single towards long on
a front-foot no-ball, Mishra has the tendency to over-step, played off the back foot to cover
the free hit is in the blockhole! Was that a seam-up ball? Chigumbura had to dig it out
played off the back foot towards cover
the length is short once again, around off stump, Chigumbura goes back and cuts the ball hard through cover point for a boundary
cut off the back foot through point
bowled slowly on middle and off, defended on the front foot
played back to the bowler from the crease
shorter length on off stump, goes back and drives through cover point
short ball around off stump, Williams goes back and cuts hard, through cover point, beating the boundary rider
played off the back foot on the leg side
driven back to the bowler, Jadeja tries to flick the ball on to the stumps behind him but misses
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
bowled full on middle and off, defended on the front foot
Chigumbura tries to guide the ball towards point but is beaten by the legspin away from him
played through square leg off the back foot
nudged off the pads towards square leg for a quick single
driven to mid-on on the front foot and the run because the fielder is on the edge of the circle
tossed up on middle and off, driven on the front foot to mid-off and it's struck firmly so there's no chance of a single
that's hit the pad but you could see all three stumps so it was clearly sliding down leg
played off the back foot to point
gos back to turn the ball square but misses and is hit on the pad by one that is missing leg
this time he stays in his crease and lofts through the line, driving the ball on the up back over the bowler's head. There's no stopping that shot
defended from the crease towards mid-on
Williams strides forward to a legbreak that pitches outside off from round the wicket and spins into him, he defends on the off side
he gets into position quickly to play the reverse sweep and makes excellent contact, placing the ball to the third man boundary
driven back towards the bowler, Mishra dives to his right to field
tossed up outside off, Williams moves forward and towards the ball and drives through extra cover
driven on the front foot to long on
that's the googly but it does not fool Chigumbura, who gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat on the front foot
a fullish length on middle and off from over the wicket, Williams is steady in his crease as he defends on the off side
short of a length on the hips, Williams misses the glance and the ball goes off his thigh to fine leg
too full on middle and Chigumbura plays a delightful straight drive, pushing half forward and driving on the up through the line, hitting it past mid-on
defended from the crease on the leg side
full once again on off stump, driven from the crease towards cover
good length on off stump, defended confidently on the front foot
goes back and slaps a shortish ball but doesn't beat the fielder at point
defended on the front foot to the bowler
tossed up outside off, Williams gets down on one knee and reverse sweeps towards deep point
this time he tries to play the regular slog sweep but misses and is hit on the pad, Mishra appeals but that hit the pad outside the line of off stump
played off the front foot to mid-on
leans forward to one outside off and drives to long-on

that's a terrific shot! Williams strides forward to a length ball outside off and opens the face to guide the ball through point, the timing is so good that Mishra at third man has absolutely no chance
banged in short and Williams ducks under it
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
another short ball but this time the line is wide down leg side
good length and straight, Williams defends on the off side
pushed on the up towards mid-off where a fumble from Unadkat allows runs
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot in front of point for a single
wide outside off with some turn away from Williams, who lets it go
Williams gets to his half-century by driving off the front foot to long off, he gets a cheer from the spectators at Queens Sports Club, but he needs to carry on for much longer
tries to cut off the back foot but is beaten outside off
played off the back foot to the bowler
defended on the front foot towards mid off
punched off the back foot towards long on, that's the 50-run stand between these two, and it's also time for drinks

lbw! Once again a wicket falls on the first ball after drinks. Mishra bowls full and it is the one that goes straight on. Chigumbura pushes forward to defend and plays outside the line. He's hit right in front of the stumps, on the back thigh, and the umpire makes his decision quickly. chigumbura looked disappointed, I'm not sure if that's because he thought he edged it.
tossed up wide outside off, Mutumbodzi tries to drive on the off side but mis-times it
gets under a flighted ball and lofts over the infield at cover point
defended on the front foot
a short ball sliding down leg side, Mutumbodzi tries to pull but does not make proper contact

caught at slip! Mishra slowed it up, flighting the ball, pitching on off and spinning away from the right-hander, Mutumbodzi pushed forward and away from his body to defend and edged it to Raina at second slip
driven from the crease to long on for a single
steps out of his crease and defends tentatively on the leg side
played off the pads behidn square
chipped uppishly towards mid-on

Mushangwe jumps out of his crease but he isn't to the pitch of the ball. He goes through his shot anyway, hitting through the line with a dead straight bat and he makes wonderful contact to hit the innings' first six
defended from the crease on the off side
played off the pads towards square leg

and that's a huge blow for Zimbabwe! Mishra has his fourth! He delivered the quicker and straighter ball from the front of his hand, Williams tried to sweep on one knee but played a bit too early, he ended up gloving it and the ball lobbed over the keeper to first slip
Jarvis gets a short legbreak first up, he drives it off the back foot through extra cover and beats the fielder running to his left from long off
goes back to defend but is beaten by the legbreak that pitches on middle and spins away
played off the back foot on the off side
that's gone high, but has it gone far enough? It has! Mushangwe got own on one knee and mowed across the line, making good contact with his slog and clearing the midwicket boundary
driven on the front foot to cover point
played from the crease towards point again
shot! Mid-off is in the circle so Jarvis stays balanced and lofts the ball cleanly over the infield to collect another boundary
the fielder goes back to long off and Jarvis drives the ball to him along the ground
Mushangwe steps out of his crease to attack and then defends because he is not to the pitch of the ball
slogs across the line and hits it along the ground to deep midwicket
Mushangwe lines it up and smacks the ball towards cow corner, where Dhawan fields
defended from the crease
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the front foot
defended on the front foot once again
tossed up outside off, Mushangwe thrashes at it and gets an inside edge through square, the umpire penalises Mishra for over-stepping but that's a harsh call
Jarvis makes room to drive the free-hit inside out through the off side but gets an inside edge towards short fine leg

this was always likely to happen. Mushangwe cleared his front foot and slogged across the line, Mishra pitched outside off and spun the googly into the right-hander, beating the bat and hitting middle stump to pick up his fifth wicket. That's his maiden five-wicket haul in ODIs.
Shami hits the pads with a good length ball angling into the right hander but that is missing leg stump
good length on middle and off, defended from the crease on the off side
short ball and the batsman lets it go, the umpire decides that one is too high
a length ball on middle stump, the batsman stays in his crease and swings across the line to hit through midwicket
prods at it off the back foot and is beaten outside off
played off the back foot towards point
short of a length on leg and middle, worked off the back off towards square
goes right back and defends towards the bowler
that's the googly, the batsman goes back and defends
he oversteps again, the batsman cuts to point, that's another harsh call from the umpire
the free hit is edged to slip I think and is caught, but it won't be out
driven from the crease towards cover

Mishra has six and the record! He has 18 wickets in the series, equalling Srinath's record for most wickets in a bilateral series. Srinath took 18 in seven games in NZ in 2002-03. Mishra has 18 in five games. Vitori pushed tentatively from the crease at a flighted delivery and edged it to slip.

inn2.comm: considerable bounce after Jarvis pitches short of a length outside off, Pujara stays back and shoulders arms
short of a length outside off, defended from the crease on the off side
short of a length wide outside of, Pujara lets it go again

bowled him! That is some delivery, it's gone clean through Pujara's defences. It pitched on a good length just outside off, drawing Pujara forward. The ball cut back into the right-hander, bursting through the gap between bat and pad and hitting the top of middle stump. He was out in similar fashion in the previous game
good length and straight, on middle and off, defended on the back foot
short of a length outside off, Rahane lets it go through to the keeper. Jarvis starts with a maiden
short of a length outside off, left alone by Dhawan
pitches on a good length around off and angles into the left-hander, Dhawan tries to drive and gets an inside edge on to the pad
a full ball on middle and off, Dhawan tries to drive but gets an outside edge towards third man
Dhawan drives on the up, but does not get past cover
played off the pads through square leg
good length, angling into the left-hander, Dhawan stays in his crease an defends to point
a full ball slides down leg side and brushes the pad to beat the keeper after Rahane doesn't connect with the glance
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
a full ball outside off, nearly in the blockhole, Dhawan stays in his crease and plays it out towards cover
shot! A half-volley outside off and Dhawan sends the ball racing to the extra-cover boundary with a graceful drive on the front foot
pushed off the back foot in front of point for a quick single
good length around off, punched off the front foot on the off side
strays on to leg stump and Dhawan works the ball behind square for a single
moves forward and across and plays the ball towards square leg
short of a length with width outside off, Dhawan meets it on the front foot and square cuts the ball through cover point, hitting it superbly
short of a length and straight, much closer to the body this time and Dhawan punches towards mid-off
short ball slanting own leg side, Dhawan rocks back and pulls hard, smashing the ball behind square, hitting it with the angle
a full ball wide down leg side, Dhawan tries to flick but it is too far away from him
poor bowling, length on the pads, Dhawan clips it away so firmly that fine leg has little chance even though the ball is not far away to his right
full and straight, defended towards midwicket
length on leg stump, Rahane moves across and turns it off his pads behind square
Rahan gets behind the line of a good length delivery that angles into him and defends towards the bowler
Rahan stays in his crease and nudges the ball off his pads to the fine leg boundary, Jarvis got too straight that time
Rahane gets on to the front foot and drives to mid-off
good length around off, Rahane gets forward and punches back to the bowler
a full ball angling into the pads, clipped off the pads to midwicket

he's picked that up off his pads and lifted it over the deep midwicket boundary, Bryan Strang dives forward to try and catch it but can't get to it. The ball was too full and Dhawan got under it nicely
defended from the crease on the leg side
outstanding timing, Dhawan punched a short ball off the front foot, placing it in the gap at cover and once it was through the infield the fielders had no chance

top-edged and dropped! Dhawan top-edged a pull towards short fine leg, where the fielder began to get under the ball even with the sun in his eyes. He then saw Taylor running from the keeper's position and left it to his captain. Taylor dived full length but did not get to it. It was certainly the short fine leg fielder's catch
defended on the off side
starts with a good length ball on off, Rahane gets behind the line and defends
pitches it up on the stumps, Rahane closes the face as he pushes to mid on
moves well forward now to a length ball some way outside off, cannot beat extra cover
just outside off, just short of driving length, Rahane moves across and pushes it back

what a mix-up, and what a letoff from Brendan Taylor, Rahane was at the same end as Dhawan after pushing down the ground, Dhawan was in no mood to go for the run, mid on fielded with a dive and threw it back, Rahane had absolutely no chance of beating the throw, but Taylor in his haste to dive forward towards the stumps, failed to collect the ball, although he did a fine job of breaking the wickets with his gloves, just when you thought Taylor's series could not get any worse ...
defends a length ball on middle
sprays it too far wide across with the angle
just outside off stump, good length, left alone
comes forward and opens the face late to push to covers
reaches a wide and full ball and pushes to cover
driven to sweeper cover
and another run out chance, Rahane walks across and works to square leg, who dives and throws the ball at the striker's end, but misses, Rahane dived, but a direct hit would have been mighty close
there for the drive, pitched up outside off, and Dhawan crashes it to sweeper cover
pushed off the front foot to mid off
walking across to off stump and working a short of a length ball past midwicket, who has a long chase
full and wide, Dhawan reaches for it and guides it to point
pitched up on middle and leg, he checks the push to the off side, with a man on the drive at short extra
tries to drive a good length ball, a thick edge runs to third man
angled across the left-hander, good length, guided to point
lucky, late in coming forward to a length ball slanted across him, thick inside edge misses the stumps and goes to short fine
back of a length this time, and some width as well, Dhawan cuts hard past short cover-point, and beats backward point as well
right forward to a pitched up ball around off, and defends
overpitched, driven along the ground to wide mid off
overpitched again, slowish, he mistimes it back to the bowler
short, wide and skiddy, Rahane cuts but straight to third man
short of a good length, guided to point
Jarvis takes another wicket, Dhawan pushes at a good length delivery close to off stump, tight line, had to play at it, and it is a healthy edge through to  Taylor
good length, right on off stump, he leans forward and defends
a touch widish, left alone outside off
goes pushing at another widish delivery, the fuller length makes him do that, and he is lucky not to edge it
pitched up outside off stump, Rahane drives to short extra cover
gets forward and runs a length ball to third man
overpitched on off, he pushes, but without enough power to beat mid off
left with the angle taking the length ball outside off
down the pads, but Jadeja works it straight to square leg
more effort on this length ball just outside off, Jadeja punches to point
works a back of a length ball from outside off to midwicket
short ball, around off, Jadeja wants to pull, but it arrives much quicker than he thought he would, and he checks the stroke
short of a length, punched neatly but not wide enough of point
leans forward into a crisp drive, but it is hit straight to mid off
beaten, pushes without much foot movement at a length ball just outside off
slightly fuller on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
angled it in just outside off from wide of the crease, defended back
overpitched, but he cannot time the drive past extra cover
this time he's timed and placed the drive, took it from around off and sent it past the non-striker, no chance for mid on
tries to repeat the stroke to another overpitched ball, but hits it into the pitch bowler is able to stop it on the bounce, Rahane was walking out and has to hurry back
overpitched yet again, pushed back  softly
good length, outside off, he shuffles across and blocks
Jarvis pretty accurate today, good length ball right on off, defended
reaches at a full delivery for the drive, opens the face, but the cover region is well-manned
Jadeja tries the leg side now, takes it from around off and whips it, but mid on is in the way
still can;t get that single, Jarvis again on off stump, good length, pushed to mid off
wide delivery, Jadeja thought of going after it, but didn;t
and ends with one more length ball on off, it is pushed back, if only Jarvis had shown so much control when the series was alive
flights it full outside off, it is pushed to wide long off
tossed up quicker on the pad, worked square, and Jadeja is off the mark off his 19th delivery
swatted straight to midwicket against the turn
flighted and angled into middle, driven to long off, the initial call is for two but they are not getting more than one

not much of a shout for lbw as Jadeja misses a legbreak that pitches middle on a good length, he is caught in the crease in front of leg stump, that was worth a loud, long appeal, that was real close, Jadeja should not have had much to complain about had that been given
blocked off the front foot
tossed up ball pushed to long off
overpitched ball turned to midwicket
leans forward and across to work a full ball from off to long on
flatter one, cut to the sweeper
taken from outside off and worked with the turn to midwicket
this is a short, quick and outside off but Jadeja has smacked it straight to point, missed out
a flighted full toss, but it is only pushed back to the bowler
much slower, nicely bowled, Rahane comes forward and defends
tossed up and angled in from wide of the crease, turned to wide long on
Jadeja gets another flat and widish one that he cuts to point
skips out this time, takes it on the full and gets a single to long on
quicker one, shortish, Rahane goes back and chops it from close to off, wide of point
pushed through quick on the pad, worked square
low full toss hit down to long on
another short and quick delivery angled in, Rahane goes back and pulls hard, in the air, over midwicket
quick again, but flighted fullish, defended
middle and leg now, turned to backward square leg
overpitched and down the leg side, Rahane tries the paddle sweep, misses, as does the keeper
flighted full on middle and leg, pushed to long on
tossed up but too full and eased through extra cover for a couple
tossed up slowly, Rahane attacks it and lofts it straight down the ground
knocks it down to long on
flat and quick, now Jadeja opens up and pulls, but deep square leg denies the boundary with a sprint and a dive to his right
pushed in front of cover for one
goes back to a tossed up fullish ball and just gets the bat down in time
lunges forward and guides it to cover
bat well in front of pad as he stretches forward to block
overpitched, hit past the bowler to long on
pushed to extra cover
flat and quick, angled down the pad, but Rahane misses out
high full toss, he's done well to push it past extra cover, there is a big gap there, long off finally reaches it before the sweeper
steps down and drives but midwicket dives to make a superb stop
spins in quickly, hits the pad, and pops up fine
went back for the cut, but there was lots of turn on this one, spun right back on middle and he checked the shot
drags it down the leg side
has pushed it quick and down the leg side again
defended off the front foot
pushed to the bowler off the front foot
nudged to square leg, and no chance of a run
gets forward and works from off stump to long on
overpitched on off, eased to long on
nice, straighter one, drew him into a big drive with the flight, Rahane beaten, even keeper didn't pick it
overpitched, driven down to long off
goes across the left-hander this one, quick and flat from the back of the hand, blocked
reaches forward to a flighted one and pushes to long off
right forward to defend a flighted ball
Jadeja charges out and hits hard into the pitch, and straight into the bowler
a shout for lbw as he presses forward, was far outside his crease, could have been outside the line too
Jadeja responds with a charge and a straight loft over the bowler
flighted googly, he is right forward to smother it
goes deep in the crease to nudge to square leg
quicker one, he goes back to pull but cannot time it past midwicket
flat delivery, he goes back and punches this time through extra cover, and the sweeper's dive is in vain
on off stump, he is forward to defend down the pitch
drives a tossed up ball to the sweeper
around off stump, defended off the front foot
flighted slowly, Jadeja pushes, bowler dives to his right and prevents the single
lots of flight outside off, driven to sweeper cover
spins in and bounces, but down the pads, and is worked behind square
goes back to a flighted one which hurries on with the angle, and gets bat down in time
wants to work through midwicket again but this time there is lots of turn
on the pads, turned to square leg
googly, but very wide, Jadeja reaches out and slaps it past extra cover
a flighted full toss on off stump, Jadeja smashes it past the bowler, and mid off is up
bat in front of pad to defend down the pitch
reaches forward and across to defend
comes out, Williams shortens it, and Jadeja nudges it to short fine
waits on this tossed up ball and pushes to extra cover
straightens on off stump, Rahane goes back and punches to long off to reach a fifty in his only game of the series, has made good use of a rare chance
on off, defended off the front foot
and the part-timer has struck, Rahane had been going back to fullish deliveries, this one spins in sharply from outside off, and hits the middle stump
a tossed up full toss on off stump whipped to long on
angled in full from round the stumps, pushed to midwicket
bowled slower, he comes forward to block
spins away and bounces outside off stump, Jadeja is surprised but plays it out safely
flighted delivery on off stump, DK forward to defend
angled down the pads, DK misses the sweep, Taylor misses the take, yet again this afternoon, there is a direct hit but Jadeja is home
steps out, Williams shortens the length, and Jadeja has to defend
helpful low full toss, Jadeja cracks it straight down the ground between bowler and non-striker
pushed to extra cover
difficult chance, Jadeja steps out and lofts, Jarvis at long on sets himself up and jumps close to the boundary, but it hits his hands and falls onto the rope
defended off the front foot
full outside off, he is forward to block again
opens the face as he comes forward and runs it to point
quick and flatter, punched to midwicket from outside off
moves across and softly works this with the spin fine down the leg side
overpitched from round the stumps, eased to long off
starts with a length ball that goes well down the leg side
slight width on this length ball, Jadeja guides it to point
Jadeja crashes a drive off this overpitched delivery but straight to mid off
another overpitched ball, Jadeja picks the gap between extra cover and mid off with a lofted drive
opens the face and dabs it behind point
just outside off to the right-hander, DK steps forward and defends
on middle now, he pushes it past the bowler and a sharp single is taken
superb placement from DK, he reaches forward and takes the flighted ball on the full and just eases it between extra cover and mid off, who runs across and dives, but it beats him
opens the face as he pushes to extra cover
walks out and nudges with the spin to midwicket
forward to defend a flighted ball
walks out, takes it on the full and hits it to long on
opens the face and runs a pitched up ball to backward point
this is just a push to an overpitched ball, just past the non-striker's stumps, but it is timed so well it is a long chase for mid on and mid off
length ball on the pad, turned behind square
was setting himself up for a big swing, but checked it and steered the length ball to point
hes whipped this full delivery powerfully, but there is long on in place
swatted from outside off to midwicket
goes back to a length ball and works it through square leg, immediately calls for two
almost in the blockhole, pushed down the track
this came in quickly with the angle as he backed away to cut, took it from off but could not beat backward point

appeal for a catch at slip as the ball pops up even as Jadeja attempts a sweep, it hit the pad, looped fine down leg, then seemed to hit the back of the bat, change direction, and pop to slip, not given, though, Taylor had even started walking towards the bowler, clapping his gloves together
another fast one angled in, this time he is able to steer it past backward point
Jadeja seals a 5-0 sweep for India with a powerful pull
